abstract: HowStuffWorks, an informational Web site for the mechanically minded, said it closed a new $75 million funding round that included investors Capital Research & Management and Chilton Investment Company. Billionaire financier Carl Icahn also participated in the round, The Deal said.
lead_paragraph: HowStuffWorks, an informational Web site for the mechanically minded, said it closed a new $75 million funding round that included investors Capital Research & Management and Chilton Investment Company. Billionaire financier Carl Icahn also participated in the round, The Deal said.
